title: Weekly mortgage applications stall as rates take a respite
text: After several weeks of volatility, mortgage rates calmed down, and that offered little incentive for homeowners or buyers to make a move.

title: Defensive OPEC alliance has 'no clear endgame' in an era of abundant supply, expert says
text: There's only so much that OPEC and its oil-producing allies can actually do in a world filled with "factors beyond their control," Citi's Global Head of Commodities Research Ed Morse told CNBC.

title: Oil prices rise after U.S. crude stockpile drop
text: Oil prices rebounded slightly on Wednesday after a steep fall in the previous session as OPEC and its allies' decision to extend output cuts was not enough to counter investors' concerns about the slowing global economy.

title: Commerce Department still considers Huawei blacklisted despite Trump's deal
text: A senior official reportedly asserted that Commerce agents should abide by its "presumption of denial" licensing policy in an email.

title: U.S. Yields Hit Lowest Since 2016 As Bonds Advance: Markets Wrap
text: Bonds extended gains globally ahead of the U.S. holiday and as investors weighed a run of poor economic data.Stocks in Europe rose.

title: Europe rallies as bond yields plough new lows
text: Action on world markets focused on bonds on Wednesday, with a fresh slide in benchmark debt yields on simmering global trade war and recession fears, central bank easing bets and ebbing oil prices.

title: Pros and Cons of Retirement Income Funds
text: Retirement Income Funds can be a simple solution to the thorny asset distribution problem. Leave the investment management to the pros.

title: 10-year Treasury yield drops to lowest level since 2016, dipping further below 2%
text: U.S. government debt prices were higher Wednesday morning, amid intensifying concerns about global economic growth.

title: EU banks worry about dividends as capital demands jump
text: Major European Union banks face a collective shortfall of 135 billion euros ($153 billion) to meet global capital requirements by 2027, meaning they may need use profits to raise their capital by at least 24.4%, the European Banking Authority said.

title: Dow futures slightly higher amid global growth concerns
text: A rally in global stocks following a trade truce between the two world's two largest economies appeared to be rapidly losing steam.

title: Oil prices steady amid U.S. stockpile drop, OPEC supply cut extension
text: Oil prices were steady on Wednesday after a steep fall in the previous session, supported by extended output cuts by OPEC and its allies despite concerns that a slowing global economy could crimp demand.

title: Despite Trumpâ€™s promised reprieve, Commerce Department tells staff to continue treating Huawei as blacklisted
text: President Donald Trump recently promised to ease the ban on American companies doing business with Huawei, but the Commerce Department is requiring its staff to treat Huawei as if the blacklist is still in place, reports Reuters.
